messages.subject: Ferberizing
messages.msgSnippet: We read Ferber too - I thought some of his sleep theories made sense, but I didn t manage to ferberize my kids. I tried with my eldest - for about 30 seconds
messages.messageBody:
We read Ferber too - I thought some of his sleep theories made sense, but I didn't manage to ferberize my kids. I tried with my eldest - for about 30 seconds and gave up. It was just not something I could do.

I ended up going to his room night after night and when the second one came around, she slept in our bed from day. I regret not taking my eldest into our bed from day too. I feel he has missed out on so much, and that time is now gone. I can never get it back. Too bad we sometimes listen to bad parenting advice.

Dalene


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
